page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT IN BATH
page.content: THIS IS A GENERAL BREAKDOWN OF EMPLOYMENT IN BATH,THESE FIGURES WERE GIVEN TO US BY THE CAREERS OFFICE IN BATH. 1.AGRICULTURAL,FORESTRY AND FISHING={ {233.}2.ENERGY/WATER SUPPLY INDUSTRIES= {1316.}3.EXTRACTION/MANUFACTURE- MINERALS/METALS={178} 4.METAL GOODS/VEHICLE INDUSTRIES{ } ETC.={3406.}5.OTHER MANUFACTURING INDUSTRIES.={2820}6.CONSTRUCTION.={ {2501}7.DISTRIBUTION/HOTELS/CATERING, REPAIRS={8752} 8.TRANSPORT/COMMUNICATIONS.={3431}9. BANKING/FINANCE/INSURANCE ETC.={3011 10.OTHER SERVICES={19136.} IN BATH THE{UNEMPLOYMENT RATE}IN MARCH 1985 WAS{9.9% (11.4%}FOR MALES AND {7.8%}FOR{FEMALES)}THIS COMPARES WITH {13.7%}FOR{U.K. (16.5%}MALES AND{9.9% FEMALES).
